name: Rocket LIG
description:
The aim of the game is to help the car go as far as possible, and you get to be in charge of creating the road as the car advances! You do this by using the blocks that pop up in the top right corner of the screen. If the car moves too slowly or falls off the track, the game will come to an end and you will receive a score that's displayed on the top of the screen. It's a fun and friendly challenge that's perfect for all ages! So buckle up and get ready for a ride!
